front.title: V2ToV1 Mapping SNMPv2 onto SNMPv1 within a bi-lingual SNMP agent

abstract.t: The goal of this memo is to document a common way of mapping an SNMPv2 response into an SNMPv1 response within a bi-lingual SNMP agent (one that supports both SNMPv1 and SNMPv2). This memo provides information for the Internet community. This memo does not specify an Internet standard of any kind.
